channel.title: Slots!
channel.description:
Enjoy ;)
If you don't care for the odds, feel free to adjust them.
Edit: Attached the new version.
New features:
"Make Loan" (I didn't like losing all the time. So what? :D)
Bet choosing. 10, 25, and 50. Higher you bet, more stand to win.

item.title: Slots!
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

I haven’t yet toyed with bitmaps on a form. I will later, though. (I’m probably not gonna bitmap this script up, though.)

I do too

You can go down through the script and edit whatever you want. I really don’t mind.

You can also use CE with that. (Really with any SCAR form game.)

Read full topic

item.title: Slots!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

its better now, but you should put in bitmap pictures of the fruits, maybe a bitmap of the slot pulling bar instead of a pull button, and stuff like that. I love the taking a loan thing lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Slots!
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

I actually did add more to it. Kept it to myself there. Here ya go, I’ll attach the new version up there.

Edit: Also attached the dfm. Just in case you wanted to mess around with that.

Read full topic

item.title: Slots!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Cool, but it has so much more potential lol.

Add more pictures, maybe make us choose how much we bet, make the form look better, and stuff. It is a start but when i look at it, i think of how much more potential it can have lol.

Read full topic
